thread.title: Y-3 Debuts the BOOST Infused Kozoko Low in Two Colorways
thread.title_full: Y-3 Debuts the BOOST Infused Kozoko Low in Two Colorways

author: Jesse Bernard
title: Y-3 Debuts the BOOST Infused Kozoko Low in Two Colorways
text:
Visit the original post to see all 2 images from this gallery. 
Japanese designer Yohji Yamamoto has shared his latest adidas sneaker with the Y-3 Kozoko Low. The Kozoko Low comes in two colorways, black and steel grey, keeping with Y-3’s standard color palette. Sat atop the adidas BOOST sole, the Kozoko Low features a stylish single-piece sock upper with a supportive leather sidewall and TPU cover.
A few days ago, Y-3 unveiled a short film bringing to life the SS17 collection, showcasing the brand’s futuristic footwear and signature color palette. The campaign was written and directed by Robert Broadhurst, and is set in a dystopian universe with two protagonists facing off against an oppressive surveillance regime.
You can buy the Kozoko Low here for $350 online and in selected Y-3 stores:
Buy Now / $350 In other sneaker news, this new adidas Ultra BOOST comes with with iridescent three stripes.
